description: A modular Telegram Music Bot using pytgcalls.

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: Add the Heroku app name here. Required for updates.

HEROKU_KEY.description: Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account. Required for updates.

MAX_ASSISTANT_COUNT.description: Maximum assistant count for recognize ASSISTANT_TOKENn variables.

ASSISTANT_TOKEN1.description: First assistant token. You can add more assistant accounts like ASSISTANT_TOKEN2, ASSISTANT_TOKEN3, ...

BOT_OWNER.description: Bot owner's user id. PM is used to log errors for now.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token for manage assistant accounts.

name: Hedoshi Music Bot
